1284160.name: Angstrom Station VR
1284160.description:
Routine maintenance is anything but routine on Angstrom Station. What's going on!? Nothing is what it seems. Survive this really bad day.

Angstrom Station VR is an intense, hair raising, tension filled virtual reality experience. As a service technician on the Angstrom Station, it is your job to run routine maintenance on the elevators. During your maintenance shift, thing go awry in ways you couldn't have imagined.

  • Solve puzzles
  • Repair equipment
  • Avoid unknown threats
  • Avoid a grisly death
  • Survive Angstrom Station
1284160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
